fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
Base: $70
1 Room: $80
2 Rooms: $90
3 Rooms: $100
4 Rooms: $110
Second Floor: $150

fields.name: Stop-In Effect:
fields.value: If you can paay the rent without going bankrupt, you will get Luigi's Die. Rolling this will give you one of these numbers: [1, 1, 1, 5, 6, 7] If the property is un-owned, or you are the owner, Luigi will give you his die for free.
